title: Fundraising | Scaling Your Startup S2 E4 with  Density’s Andrew Farah and SoleSavy’s Dejan Pralica | E1210
description: Two startup CEOs share their approach to fundraising, Andrew Farah explains the strategy he used to raise $100M for Density (03:58), Dejan simplifies his community-forming principles for SoleSavy (38:27), and both give tactical lessons from the mistakes they made along the way (46:23)! Deck: https://bit.ly/3b8gz8g
